attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For a start this war is not ours, in a recent petition the Goverment told us that they have a duty to Iraq, well how about their own country? How do we stand if we do not have a say in the matter! These are our men, our sons, they are being killed, and for what?! It's an endless war, So many lives are already wasted and are at Risk, and this in not even a duty to our own country, but its our men that are being killed. So it is of this fact I ask The PM to withdraw our troops from Iraq!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
